## Introduction

hgchmagic has a set of functions to assists users when plotting data. Here youÂ´ll see how to use it.


### Bar plots

The core function to plot a bar plot with hgchmagic is `hgch_bar()`

```{r}
data <- ggplot2::diamonds
data <- dsdataprep::aggregation_data(data = data,
                                       agg = "sum",
                                       group_var = "cut",
                                       to_agg = "price")

hgch_bar(data, var_cat = "cut", var_num = "price")
```
